keyword: how many calories in a beatbox
title: How Many Calories in a BeatBox?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a beatbox, including carbs, sugars, alcohol content, and nutrition breakdowns for this popular alcoholic punch.
h1: How Many Calories in a BeatBox?
assumptions: One 250ml serving of standard BeatBox alcoholic punch (e.g., Blue Razzberry), 11% ABV, fruit-flavored with added sugars; no ice or mixers.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by flavor, brand batch, serving size, and exact formulation. Alcoholic beverages' calories can differ; check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A single 250ml BeatBox serving contains about 210 kcal, primarily from alcohol and sugars.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison with beverage labels.

tweaks.label: Add ice and dilute with soda (reduces concentration)

faqs.q: How many calories in a beatbox serving?
faqs.a: Approximately 210 kcal for a standard 250ml BeatBox.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a beatbox?
faqs.a: About 30 g carbs, mostly sugars at 25 g per serving.

faqs.q: Does a beatbox have protein or fat?
faqs.a: No significant protein or fat; calories come from alcohol and carbs.

faqs.q: How does BeatBox compare to other alcoholic punches?
faqs.a: Similar to boxed cocktails, around 200-250 kcal per serving depending on ABV and sweetness.
Yes, zero-sugar versions reduce calories to about 150 kcal by cutting sugars.
